name: penguin
notes:
**skill level**
beginner. if you need any help, check out [www.thewoobles.com][1] for tutorials, or reach out to [wooble.on@gmail.com][2]!

**completely new to amigurumi?**
buy a [penguin crochet kit][3] from [my etsy shop][4], or directly from [my website][5]. it includes an in-depth tutorial on how to get started with crochet, and comes with all the materials you need. after going through the kit, you’ll be on your way to being able to make all the woobles patterns!

**materials**
- 24 yds of blue acrylic worsted-weight yarn
- 2 yds of white acrylic worsted-weight yarn
- 2 yds of yellow acrylic worsted-weight yarn
- 2 10mm plastic safety eyes
- polyfill
- tapestry needle
- stitch marker
- 4mm crochet hook

**size**
3.5 in (8.9 cm) tall

**language**
english with us terminology
